Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: A friend just so happen to live near this facility a few years ago.  I did not expect to run across Sing Sing.  I was looking for a historical marker but could not find one...would be a nice addition. The facility was gloomy...very.

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Great place. 5 star accommodation.  Free room and board.  The night time masseuse was a little rough and handsy lol and the waiters kind of rude and rough . Once you get in your not going to want to leave.  Or be able to leave

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Don’t know much about the jail yet I can say this I was at a family cookout for hours on the water front before I realized I was right next to the jail. It’s a sad place yet it doesn’t take away from the beauty of the area and for some odd reason I felt safe

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: if your flatulence makes noise, then u will have a target on your back, this will continue until ur flatulence makes a distance faint whistling noise

Name: Sing Sing

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: After reading all these great reviews I can't wait to spend some time here, I mean who wouldn't it is a prime waterfront property!

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Very dated rooms,carpet needed replaced,room service was very lacking,walls paper thin-heard screaming all night. To make your stay more enjoyable, be nice to your bunk mate, avoid the yard,and don't eat the beans and weenies.

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Scenic views of the Hudson and a great gift shop!

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: I gave if three stars for the simple fact that everything in here is way to much and the currency's never this complex is completely different than it is in the city. The showers were somewhat crowded and people were a bit to friendly while …

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Saw my mate Kevin while I was there, we had a great time just chilling. The rooms could have been a bit better and the food was average  but it really spoke to me and felt like home. …

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Nice amenities and the whirlpool suite has a nice view of a fenced in yard where you can view live action fighting. The food is separated into five portion size containers and makes for a delightful eating experience.

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: The perfect way to turn-off from the world. No phones or WiFi - allows to fully unwind. …

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Great ppl and officers were super nice

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Not crazy about this new-fangled "industrial" decor. I guess people will go for just about anything. And talk about minimalism! You'd think the view of the water must be spectacular but not one window in my room, I mean really... …

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: This amazing airbnb is the best gem of the Hudson Valley.   It's like a cross btwn a meditation retreat and fitness training center but a bit overcroweded due to its popularity.  Rooms are bigger than my NYC apartment. I'm sure I'll be back, most patrons are repeat customers.

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Not a bad place to stay. Was under the impression the room had a balcony and was disappointed to find out it didn’t. They don’t change the sheets too often and the staff is a bit unfriendly and not too concerned with guest’s needs. Having said that, it’s free so I can’t complain.

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: My wife and I had a great time during our stay at Sing Sing. Although we could only see each other a few times and they still use landline phones we really enjoyed the time we could talk. For some strange reason we were not allowed to touch …

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Sing sing has always been a joy to go, the rooms are usually always available and the main room is like a party. I came here for my friends 30th birthday and they were very accommodating. If you're going for a good time, come to Sing Sing.

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Pretty good, all around nice place to be. The food was great!

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: I'd give it 5 stars, but the dinner menu is really limited. That being said, there is something about this place that just keeps you here...oh yea, it's the bulletproof glass, razor wire, and armed guards.

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Although I think prisons are generally for bad people, there are a few innocent people that are locked up. However, there's no way of us knowing the bad from the good. The moral of the story is stay out of trouble. Also, some folks are …

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: A great place to visit but I wouldn't want to live there.

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: WHY do prisons INSIST on you getting job training or your GED??? You're a FELON, you'll NEVER get a decent paying job with a felony record-even after 30 years out of prison!! (I speak from experience) Maybe THAT'S why the U.$ has the world's highest recidivism rate!!!!

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: In the processing area, you will see family members shunned away for various attire technicalities. I personally, had to go into a bathroom once and take the stitching out of my shirt with my teeth, because I wasn’t allowed on the visiting …

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: They've got a great hot box

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Great place a real microcosm of everything New York represents multiple ethnic and national groups from all walks of life living in close proximity to one another food and rooms are a little on the small side but I ain’t complaining and besides legally speaking the staff aren’t actually required by law to feed us

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Fantastic, I could wish for a better holiday. The only thing was that when I was in there, I couldn't leave. But don't stress it, Life moves fast, if you dont stop and look around once in a while you might miss it.

Name: Sing Sing
Review Text: Special thanks to Bubba he was Very Friendly and always followed me everywhere I went, albeit a bit too closely.

Review Text: Great service, no charge for room service, and the showers were awesome. Soap was pre-roped! Great place to stay with the family!
